mapper.select: SELECT TC_PWD AS pwd FROM TEACHER WHERE TC_ID=#{id}
SELECT ST_PWD AS pwd FROM STUDENT WHERE ST_ID=#{id}
SELECT ST_RFSTUDENTCODE AS studentCode FROM STUDENT WHERE ST_ID=#{id}
SELECT TC_ID AS id FROM TEACHER
SELECT ST_ID AS id FROM STUDENT WHERE ST_EMAIL=#{email}
SELECT TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMM') FROM DUAL

SELECT TO_CHAR(IOH_DATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') AS attendanceCode FROM INOUTHISTORY WHERE IOH_RFSTUDENTCODE=#{studentCode} AND IOH_TYPE=#{attendanceType} AND TO_CHAR(IOH_DATE, 'YYYYMM')=#{yyyymm} ORDER BY IOH_DATE DESC
SELECT TC_ID AS id, TC_NAME AS name,TC_EMAIL AS email, TC_PHONE AS phone FROM TEACHER WHERE TC_ID=#{id}
SELECT ST_ID AS id, ST_NAME AS name,ST_EMAIL AS email, ST_PHONE AS phone FROM STUDENT WHERE ST_RFSTUDENTCODE=#{studentCode}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM LEARNINGROOM WHERE LR_CODE=#{roomCode}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM LEARNINGROOM WHERE LR_TCID=#{id}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM LEARNINGSTUDENTREGISTER WHERE LSR_STRFSTUDENTCODE=#{studentCode}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM LEARNINGSTUDENTREGISTER WHERE LSR_STRFSTUDENTCODE=#{studentCode} AND LSR_LRCODE=#{roomCode}
SELECT LR_CODE AS roomCode, LR_NAME AS roomName, LR_CONTENT AS roomIntroduction, LR_SBCODE AS roomSB FROM LEARNINGROOM WHERE LR_TCID=#{id} ORDER BY LR_CODE ASC
SELECT LSR_LRCODE AS roomCode FROM LEARNINGSTUDENTREGISTER WHERE LSR_STRFSTUDENTCODE=#{studentCode} ORDER BY LSR_LRCODE ASC
SELECT LR_CODE AS roomCode, LR_NAME AS roomName, LR_CONTENT AS roomIntroduction, LR_SBCODE AS roomSB FROM LEARNINGROOM WHERE LR_CODE=#{roomCode}
SELECT LR_CODE AS roomCode, LR_NAME AS roomName, LR_CONTENT AS roomIntroduction, LR_SBCODE AS roomSB FROM LEARNINGROOM WHERE LR_CODE=#{roomCode}
SELECT LR_CODE AS roomCode, LR_NAME AS roomName FROM LEARNINGROOM WHERE LR_TCID=#{id}
SELECT NT_TITLE AS boardTitle, NT_DATE AS boardDate, NT_TCID AS boardId FROM NOTICE WHERE NT_LRCODE = #{roomCode} ORDER BY NT_DATE DESC

SELECT WAN_CODE AS boardCode, WAN_LRCODE AS roomCode ,WAN_STUDENTNAME AS studentName,WAN_QTSTYPEYACODE AS yearCode,WAN_QTSTYPECODE AS typeCode,WAN_QTNUMBER AS numberCode,WAN_DATE AS boardDate, WAN_QTSTYPEYASBCODE AS roomSB FROM WRONGANSWERNOTES WHERE WAN_LRCODE=#{roomCode}
SELECT LR_SBCODE AS roomSB FROM LEARNINGROOM WHERE LR_CODE=#{roomCode}
SELECT YA_NAME AS yearName FROM YEAR WHERE YA_SBCODE=#{roomSB} AND YA_CODE=#{yearCode}
SELECT STYPE_NAME AS typeName FROM SUBJECTTYPE WHERE STYPE_YASBCODE=#{roomSB} AND STYPE_YACODE=#{yearCode} AND STYPE_CODE=#{typeCode}

SELECT WAN_QTSTYPECODE AS typeCode ,COUNT(WAN_QTSTYPECODE) AS typeSum FROM WRONGANSWERNOTES WHERE WAN_QTSTYPEYACODE=#{yearCode} AND WAN_LRCODE=#{roomCode} GROUP BY WAN_QTSTYPECODE ORDER BY WAN_QTSTYPECODE ASC
SELECT WAN_QTSTYPEYACODE AS yearCode FROM WRONGANSWERNOTES WHERE WAN_LRCODE = #{roomCode} GROUP BY WAN_QTSTYPEYACODE ORDER BY WAN_QTSTYPEYACODE ASC
SELECT RR_TITLE AS boardTitle,TO_CHAR(RR_DATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') AS boardDate,RR_TCID AS boardId,RR_LRCODE AS roomCode FROM REFERENCE WHERE RR_TCID=#{id} AND RR_LRCODE=#{roomCode}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM WRONGANSWERNOTESTAG WHERE WTAG_WANLRCODE=#{roomCode} AND WTAG_WANCODE=#{boardCode}

SELECT WTAG_WANLRCODE AS roomCode, WTAG_WANCODE AS boardCode, WTAG_CONTENT AS boardContent, WTAG_DATE AS boardDate, WTAG_ROUTE AS boardRoute, WTAG_TCID AS boardId FROM WRONGANSWERNOTESTAG WHERE WTAG_WANLRCODE=#{roomCode} AND WTAG_WANCODE=#{boardCode}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM WRONGANSWERNOTESTAG WHERE WTAG_WANLRCODE=#{roomCode} AND WTAG_WANCODE=#{boardCode}
mapper.select: SELECT NT_LRCODE AS roomCode, NT_TITLE AS boardTitle, NT_DATE AS boardDate, NT_CONTENT AS boardContent, NT_ROUTE AS boardRoute, NT_TCID AS boardId FROM NOTICE WHERE NT_LRCODE = #{roomCode} AND NT_TITLE = #{boardTitle} AND NT_DATE = TO_DATE(#{boardDate},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')

SELECT RR_TITLE AS boardTitle, RR_DATE AS boardDate, RR_CONTENT AS boardContent, RR_ROUTE AS boardRoute, RR_TCID AS boardId FROM REFERENCE WHERE RR_LRCODE=#{roomCode} AND RR_DATE=TO_DATE(#{boardDate},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND RR_TITLE=#{boardTitle}
mapper.update: UPDATE NOTICE SET NT_TITLE = #{boardTitle}, NT_CONTENT = #{boardContent}, NT_ROUTE = #{boardRoute} WHERE NT_LRCODE = #{roomCode} AND NT_DATE = TO_DATE(#{boardDate},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM NOTICE WHERE NT_LRCODE = #{roomCode} AND NT_DATE = TO_DATE(#{boardDate},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')
mapper.select: SELECT ST_NAME AS studentName FROM STUDENT WHERE ST_RFSTUDENTCODE=#{studentCode}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM WRONGANSWERNOTES WHERE WAN_STRFSTUDENTCODE=#{studentCode} AND WAN_LRCODE=#{roomCode}

SELECT WAN_CODE AS boardCode, WAN_LRCODE AS roomCode, WAN_STRFSTUDENTCODE AS studentCode, WAN_STUDENTNAME AS studentName, WAN_QTSTYPEYASBCODE AS roomSB, WAN_QTSTYPEYACODE AS yearCode, WAN_QTSTYPECODE AS typeCode, WAN_QTNUMBER AS numberCode, WAN_DATE AS boardDate FROM WRONGANSWERNOTES WHERE WAN_LRCODE=#{roomCode} AND WAN_STRFSTUDENTCODE=#{studentCode} ORDER BY WAN_DATE DESC
SELECT WAN_QTSTYPEYACODE AS yearCode FROM WRONGANSWERNOTES WHERE WAN_LRCODE = #{roomCode} AND WAN_STRFSTUDENTCODE=#{studentCode} GROUP BY WAN_QTSTYPEYACODE ORDER BY WAN_QTSTYPEYACODE ASC

SELECT WAN_QTSTYPECODE AS typeCode ,COUNT(WAN_QTSTYPECODE) AS typeSum FROM WRONGANSWERNOTES WHERE WAN_QTSTYPEYACODE=#{yearCode} AND WAN_LRCODE=#{roomCode} AND WAN_STRFSTUDENTCODE=#{studentCode} GROUP BY WAN_QTSTYPECODE,WAN_QTSTYPEYACODE ORDER BY WAN_QTSTYPECODE ASC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM WRONGANSWERNOTES WHERE SUBSTR(WAN_STRFSTUDENTCODE, 1,2) LIKE #{studentCode} AND WAN_QTSTYPEYACODE=#{yearCode} AND WAN_QTSTYPECODE=#{typeCode} AND WAN_QTNUMBER=#{numberCode}
SELECT LR_CODE AS roomCode FROM LEARNINGROOM WHERE LR_SBCODE=#{roomSB}
SELECT COUNT(LSR_STRFSTUDENTCODE) FROM LEARNINGSTUDENTREGISTER WHERE LSR_LRCODE=#{roomCode} AND SUBSTR(LSR_STRFSTUDENTCODE, 1,2) LIKE #{studentCode}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM WRONGANSWERNOTES WHERE WAN_LRCODE=#{roomCode} AND SUBSTR(WAN_STRFSTUDENTCODE, 1,2) LIKE #{studentCode} AND WAN_QTSTYPEYACODE=#{yearCode} AND WAN_QTSTYPECODE=#{typeCode} AND WAN_QTNUMBER=#{numberCode}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM LEARNINGSTUDENTREGISTER WHERE SUBSTR(LSR_STRFSTUDENTCODE, 1,2) LIKE #{studentCode} AND LSR_LRCODE=#{roomCode}

SELECT WAN_CODE AS boardCode, WAN_LRCODE AS roomCode, WAN_STRFSTUDENTCODE AS studentCode, WAN_STUDENTNAME AS studentName, WAN_QTSTYPEYASBCODE AS roomSB, WAN_QTSTYPEYACODE AS yearCode, WAN_QTSTYPECODE AS typeCode, WAN_QTNUMBER AS numberCode, WAN_DATE AS boardDate FROM WRONGANSWERNOTES WHERE WAN_LRCODE=#{roomCode} AND WAN_STRFSTUDENTCODE=#{studentCode} GROUP BY WAN_DATE,WAN_QTSTYPEYASBCODE,WAN_QTNUMBER,WAN_QTSTYPEYACODE,WAN_QTSTYPECODE,WAN_STRFSTUDENTCODE,WAN_LRCODE,WAN_QTSTYPEYASBCODE,WAN_CODE,WAN_STUDENTNAME ORDER BY WAN_QTSTYPEYACODE DESC

SELECT WAN_QTSTYPEYACODE AS yearCode, WAN_QTSTYPECODE AS typeCode, COUNT(WAN_QTSTYPECODE) AS typeSum FROM WRONGANSWERNOTES WHERE ROWNUM <= 5 AND WAN_QTSTYPEYASBCODE=#{roomSB} GROUP BY WAN_QTSTYPEYACODE,WAN_QTSTYPECODE ORDER BY COUNT(WAN_QTSTYPECODE) DESC

SELECT WAN_QTSTYPEYACODE AS yearCode, WAN_QTSTYPECODE AS typeCode, COUNT(WAN_QTSTYPECODE) AS typeSum FROM WRONGANSWERNOTES WHERE ROWNUM <= 5 AND WAN_LRCODE=#{roomCode} AND WAN_STRFSTUDENTCODE=#{studentCode} GROUP BY WAN_QTSTYPEYACODE,WAN_QTSTYPECODE ORDER BY COUNT(WAN_QTSTYPECODE) DESC

SELECT WAN_QTSTYPEYACODE AS yearCode, WAN_QTSTYPECODE AS typeCode, COUNT(WAN_QTSTYPECODE) AS typeSum FROM WRONGANSWERNOTES WHERE ROWNUM <= 5 AND WAN_QTSTYPEYASBCODE=#{roomSB} AND WAN_LRCODE=#{roomCode} GROUP BY WAN_QTSTYPEYACODE,WAN_QTSTYPECODE ORDER BY COUNT(WAN_QTSTYPECODE) DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE REFERENCE SET RR_TITLE=#{boardTitle},RR_CONTENT=#{boardContent} WHERE RR_TCID = #{boardId} AND RR_LRCODE =#{roomCode} AND RR_DATE= TO_DATE(#{boardDate},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')
mapper.select: SELECT RR_TITLE AS boardTitle,TO_CHAR(RR_DATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') AS boardDate,RR_TCID AS boardId,RR_LRCODE AS roomCode FROM REFERENCE WHERE RR_LRCODE=#{roomCode}
SELECT LSR_STRFSTUDENTCODE AS studentCode FROM LEARNINGSTUDENTREGISTER WHERE LSR_LRCODE=#{roomCode} ORDER BY LSR_STRFSTUDENTCODE ASC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM WRONGANSWERNOTES WHERE WAN_LRCODE=#{roomCode}
